title: lag?
body: I've been having this lag problem ever since I started playing Minecraft a bit but, I was getting 4k ms + and I tried playing on other games but it was only league that was lagging got any tips?

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection to the server is unstable. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are aligned with what we recommend. 

Let me know if you continue to see high latency (ping) after completing those steps.
